text: Tetsuya Mizumoto is an engineer from the Tokyo Institute of Technology, Japan. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his contributions to waveguide optical nonreciprocal devices for optical communications. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Japanese engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tetsuya Mizumoto
